Name: CVDComorbiditiesCS
Title: Cardiovascular Comorbidities
Descriptino: CodeSystem that indicate which comorbidities the patient is living with. Select all conditions that apply.

Name: ConsciousnessCS
Title: State of Consciousness according to the ICHOM standard
Descriptino: CodeSystem based on the ICHOM standard that indicates the patient's state of consciousness as measured upon arrival at the reference hospital.

Name: DiagnosisCS
Title: Diagnostic Evidence Base
Descriptino: CodeSystem that indicates which diagnostic evidence base was used for its realization

Name: DischDestCS
Title: Discharge Location
Descriptino: CodeSystem about Discharge destination following acute care hospitalization. What type of place was the patient discharged to?

Name: EstStrokeSevNIHSSCatCS
Title: Estimated stroke severity using the NIHSS.
Descriptino: CodeSystem that intends to categorize the severity of the stroke based on the National Institutes of Health Stroke Scale (NIHSS).

Name: LiveAloneCS
Title: Live Alone Pre-Stroke
Descriptino: CodeSystem indicating whether a patient lived alone prior to a stroke event based on ICHOM terminology.

Name: LivingLocPostCS
Title: Patient's Residence Post to a Stroke
Descriptino: CodeSystem that represents the patient's most recent place of residence after the occurrence of a stroke based on ICHOM code.

Name: LivingLocPreCS
Title: Patient's Residence Prior to a Stroke
Descriptino: CodeSystem that represents the patient's most recent place of residence before the occurrence of a stroke based on ICHOM code.

Name: PROMIS10CS
Title: PROMIS-10 Response Questionnaire
Descriptino: CodeSystem that defines the response values for the PROMIS-10 (Patient-Reported Outcomes Measurement Information System 10-item short form) Questionnaire.

Name: SMRSqCS
Title: Simplified Modified Ranking Scale questionnaire (sMRSq)
Descriptino: CodeSystem that defines the response values for the simplified modified Ranking Scale questionnaire (sMRSq).

Name: SmokingStatusCS
Title: Smoking Status
Descriptino: CodeSystem for Smoking Status. A person's current and past smoking behavior.

Name: StrokeFuncStatusCS
Title: Prestroke and Poststroke Functional Status
Descriptino: CodeSystem that defines the response values for the Prestroke and Poststroke Functional Status.

Name: StrokeTypeCS
Title: Stroke Type
Descriptino: CodeSystem that aims to categorize the stroke type according to the ICHOM standard.

Name: SymtDurCS
Title: Duration of Stroke Symptoms
Descriptino: CodeSystem that categorizes the duration of stroke symptoms, considering the time from symptom onset to admission at the reference hospital.
